resources.string: EmbeHome brings artificial intelligence (AI) and the power of the Internet of Things (IoT) to transform your living spaces and homes with our wide range of smart IoT devices and switchboards that work seamlessly and wirelessly, to bring you the ultimate convenience and smart experience. We design robust smart devices for India and have a customer centric focus on after sales and support across major cities.

string.name: terms_and_condition
string.u: I Agree to all Terms and Conditions*

resources.string: Give a name to this HUB
We have sent an OTP to email id

For SSB: 
 1. Keeping all switches in off state
 2. Press switch1, 4 times
 3. When the LED starts blinking, click on 'Add' in the application within 8 seconds
 4. After add is successful, LED pattern will glow on the switch board

 For RSB:
 Press buttons in the below pattern
 1. SW1 ON & OFF 3 times
 2. SW2 ON & OFF 3 times
 3. SW1 ON & OFF 3 times
 4. When the beep sound starts click on 'Add' within 8 seconds.

 For IRB:
 1. Press the reset button for 2 secs
 2. When 4th LED stable click on 'Add'

 For Curtain:
 1. Press switch 1, 4 times
 2. When the LED starts blinking, click on 'Add' within 8 seconds
Put the Hub to configuration mode by pressing the reset button for 4 seconds only. Once the light starts blinking click on Next
[Warning : Do not press the reset button for more than 6 seconds]
The WIFI network should be close to your hub and mobile phone.
Please ensure that the WIFI network is a 2.4Ghz WIFI network (not 5Ghz)
There is multiple unregistered hubs in your network please turn off other hubs which you do not want to register.
